sense.gloss: to hang down (from), to dangle, to swing, to be suspended
to be within one's reach, to dangle (before one's eyes)
to be completely reliant on, to be entirely dependent on

sdata.j: 「わたしは、|ぶら↑下↑↓さ↓がる|には、↑年↑↓とし↓をとりすぎています。」と↑男↑↓おとこ↓の↑子↑↓こ↓はいいました。
sdata.e: I am too old to swing on branches, said the boy.
